content:
I don't have access to your location information, but i can suggest a few ways to find upcoming contemporary art exhibits in your area. 

one way is to check the websites of local art museums and galleries, as they often have information about current and upcoming exhibitions. you can also search for art event listings or follow focused accounts on social media platforms such as instagram.

another resource is online platforms such as artsy and artnet, which aggregate information and galleries for contemporary art around the world. they can show you which exhibitions or art fairs are upcoming and provide recommendations based on your preferences.
